game keeps you on your toes, great place for people of all ages to meet and talk to each other on this game site. I have played Global Warfare but i have not been able to get the feel and technique and speed... i think it's more for the younger generation. cs source oynadiƒüim cs serisindeki en iyi cs oyunu

Where shall I start...

A Classic like no other. CS Source is truly a historical FPS that should be in the library of any FPS gamer worth his salt. This is where I learned how to snipe. Where I learned teamwork in FPS strategy and where my friends and I spent many many hours planting bombs and thwarting plots of terrorism! 

[h1] The Pro's [/h1] 
1) Fast Paced 
2) Team Based Action
3) Bots can be added 
4) Easy to use server manager
5) MASSIVE Community 
6) A.I. is actually very good 

[h1] The Con's [/h1]
(This is a con's list based on 2020 standards) 
1) Weapon selection is minimal but still enjoyable
2) A.I. can be too good sometimes 
3) Graphics are a bit outdated but can be modded. (If you want good graphics check out CS: GO) 
4) Game-play can be repetitive if playing alone. Best with friends. 

It truly is a classic Valve experience and built on their very own Source engine. Experience this classic with friends and even on your own if you want an experience you will never forget and want to see where the fast paced action FPS genre really made a mark in gaming history!
